text: fakhtlft alfiraq min 'ahl alkitab fima baynahum fi 'amr eisaa ealayh alslam, faminhum ghal fih wahum alnsara, faminhum man qal: hu allh, waminhum man qal: hu abn allh, waminhum man qal: thalith thalathat - taealaa allah eamaa yaqulun -, waminhum jaf eanh wahum alyhwd, qalu: sahr, wqalu: abn yusif alnjar, fhlak liladhin kafaruu min shuhud yawm eazim alhwl, wahu yawm alqyamt
